channel.title: Baking on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Baking on limericks.dailyonthis.site

A geologist named Brian, Was a master at baking a pie-an. His crust was quite flaky, Filling quite yummy, And sweet like a caramel chai-an.
